forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 51F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
